document.full_text: goldman sachs  has bought a 12 percent stake worth more than $900 million in china's taikang life insurance co ltd, giving the wall street giant a foothold into the world's biggest insurance market.
document.title: goldman bets on china insurance with $900 mln taikang stake buy
lines_and_colors: goldman sachs  has bought a 12 percent stake worth more than $900 million in china's taikang life insurance co ltd, giving the wall street giant a foothold into the world's biggest insurance market.
